00109 typedef enum DEVICE_REGISTERS {
00110   R0 = 0,
00111   R1 = 1,
00112   R2 = 2,
00113   R3 = 3,
00114   R4 = 4,
00115   R5 = 5,
00116   R6 = 6,

00122   R12 = 12,

00124   R14 = 14,
00125   R15 = 15,
00126 } DEVICE_REGISTERS_t;

00260 #define ST_ACLK   (1 << 1) 
00261 #define ST_SMCLK  (1 << 2)

00264 #define ST_TACLK  (1 << 5)
